translation: ゼロッ！先に渡るための橋が落ちてるよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロッ！先に渡るための橋が落ちてるよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: チッ……ミハイルは先に行け！私は他の道を探してみる！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: チッ……ミハイルは先に行け！私は他の道を探してみる！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ドラゴンだ！ゼロがっ……ゼロが攻めてきたぞ！{#Name="敵兵Ａ"}
source: ドラゴンだ！ゼロがっ……ゼロが攻めてきたぞ！{#Name="敵兵Ａ"}

translation: 総員！持ち場につけっ！{#Name="敵兵Ｂ"}
source: 総員！持ち場につけっ！{#Name="敵兵Ｂ"}

translation: ここから……行けそうだな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ここから……行けそうだな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ゼロだ！ゼロが来たぞっ！{#Name="敵兵Ａ"}
source: ゼロだ！ゼロが来たぞっ！{#Name="敵兵Ａ"}

translation: フォウ様の為にも！ここで食い止める！{#Name="敵兵Ｂ"}
source: フォウ様の為にも！ここで食い止める！{#Name="敵兵Ｂ"}

translation: 殺せ！裏切り者のゼロを殺すんだ！{#Name="敵兵Ａ"}
source: 殺せ！裏切り者のゼロを殺すんだ！{#Name="敵兵Ａ"}

translation: フォウ様！私たちに力を……っ！{#Name="敵兵Ｂ"}
source: フォウ様！私たちに力を……っ！{#Name="敵兵Ｂ"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hmph.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmph.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero! Are you okay!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! Are you okay!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Holy shit...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Holy shit...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: So...that's how an Intoner regenerates...?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So...that's how an Intoner regenerates...?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: This can't end...until all of them are dead.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This can't end...until all of them are dead.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It can't end.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It can't end.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Break through the enemy's defenses.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Break through the enemy's defenses.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Cerberus!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: She's here! The demon Intoner is here!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: She's here! The demon Intoner is here!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Dammit. I knew she'd come. We all should've known!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Dammit. I knew she'd come. We all should've known!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Dragon!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Dragon!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: An Intoner atop a dragon? This must be the end of the world!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: An Intoner atop a dragon? This must be the end of the world!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: An Intoner atop a dragon? {LF}This must be the end of the world!{#Name="兵士B"}
source: An Intoner atop a dragon? {LF}This must be the end of the world!{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: You could never understand what Lady Four means to us!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: You could never understand what Lady Four means to us!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: 虫ならまだいいんじゃないか？{#Name="兵士B"}
source: 虫ならまだいいんじゃないか？{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: We've gotta do everything we can here!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: We've gotta do everything we can here!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Yeah, until the dragon stomps us into pudding...{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Yeah, until the dragon stomps us into pudding...{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Lady Four is under siege!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Lady Four is under siege!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: What can we possibly do...?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: What can we possibly do...?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: 不憫なウタヒメ様だよな{#Name="兵士B"}
source: 不憫なウタヒメ様だよな{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: Wow, dragons are HUGE!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Wow, dragons are HUGE!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Watch the tail! It'll kill you in a single blow!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Watch the tail! It'll kill you in a single blow!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Save your breath! Here it comes!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Save your breath! Here it comes!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: じゃあ、丸焼きか。俺ら全員、黒こげか{#Name="兵士C"}
source: じゃあ、丸焼きか。俺ら全員、黒こげか{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: 一瞬で焼け死ねたらいいな。瀕死の重症とか嫌だよね{#Name="兵士D"}
source: 一瞬で焼け死ねたらいいな。瀕死の重症とか嫌だよね{#Name="兵士D"}

translation: Did Lady Four get away safely?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Did Lady Four get away safely?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: I don't know!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: I don't know!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: This is such a disaster...{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: This is such a disaster...{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Is Lady Four with Decadus!?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Is Lady Four with Decadus!?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Most likely!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Most likely!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: あの巨体のデカート様がいりゃ安心だよな？{#Name="兵士B"}
source: あの巨体のデカート様がいりゃ安心だよな？{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: どうかな？巨体は目立つからな……{#Name="兵士E"}
source: どうかな？巨体は目立つからな……{#Name="兵士E"}

translation: Lady Four never makes a poor decision...{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Lady Four never makes a poor decision...{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Now we must follow in her footsteps!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Now we must follow in her footsteps!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: ……可能なかぎりで{#Name="兵士A"}
source: ……可能なかぎりで{#Name="兵士A"}

translation: Lady Four's with Decadus. I'm sure she's safe.{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Lady Four's with Decadus. I'm sure she's safe.{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Let's hope so.{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Let's hope so.{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Bring it on, demon!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Bring it on, demon!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Damn you, Zero... Damn the accursed Intoner...{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Damn you, Zero... Damn the accursed Intoner...{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: We're under attack! The demon Intoner is here!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: We're under attack! The demon Intoner is here!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: We're all gonna dieeeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: We're all gonna dieeeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Where should we go, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Where should we go, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You got me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You got me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: How the hell should I know where Four's holed up?{LF}She could be anywhere.{#Name="Zero"}
source: How the hell should I know where Four's holed up?{LF}She could be anywhere.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So you don't even know if this is the right path?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So you don't even know if this is the right path?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Nope.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nope.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What the hell, lady!?{#Name="Dito"}
source: What the hell, lady!?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ugh. All of a sudden, my legs feel ten pounds{LF}heavier...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ugh. All of a sudden, my legs feel ten pounds{LF}heavier...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Want me to chop 'em off for ya?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Want me to chop 'em off for ya?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Fine, fine. I'll shut up.{#Name="Dito"}
source: ...Fine, fine. I'll shut up.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: さあ、足を出せ。どちらかぶった斬れば、片足分軽くなる{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: さあ、足を出せ。どちらかぶった斬れば、片足分軽くなる{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ……遠慮しとく{#Name="ディト"}
source: ……遠慮しとく{#Name="ディト"}

translation: I'm gonna go on ahead.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'm gonna go on ahead.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey! You can't just fly off while we're stuck{LF}hoofin' it!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey! You can't just fly off while we're stuck{LF}hoofin' it!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Why not? I'd just get in your way down there!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why not? I'd just get in your way down there!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And besides, this way I can scout out{LF}what's ahead!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And besides, this way I can scout out{LF}what's ahead!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Huh. Well, have fun being our decoy.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Huh. Well, have fun being our decoy.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hey, dummy? {LF}If you give away our location, I'll kill you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey, dummy? {LF}If you give away our location, I'll kill you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I...I know that...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I...I know that...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And besides, {LF}this way I can scout out what's ahead!{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: And besides, {LF}this way I can scout out what's ahead!{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Zero, check it out! Watch me go!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero, check it out! Watch me go!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I'm gonna try double hard and show these{LF}guys just what I'm made of!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'm gonna try double hard and show these{LF}guys just what I'm made of!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: God, he's a handful.{#Name="Dito"}
source: God, he's a handful.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Don't you ever get tired of babysitting him?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Don't you ever get tired of babysitting him?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Of course. And now I've got two brats to babysit.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Of course. And now I've got two brats to babysit.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Whatever, Grandma.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Whatever, Grandma.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You wanna die?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You wanna die?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Goddammit, Four...{LF}Making me come all the way out here...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddammit, Four...{LF}Making me come all the way out here...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You're hardly worth hiding{LF}in some secret wild paradise...{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're hardly worth hiding{LF}in some secret wild paradise...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: All this hiking is gonna turn me{LF}into a muscle-bound freak.{#Name="Dito"}
source: All this hiking is gonna turn me{LF}into a muscle-bound freak.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm not into the buff, macho look.{LF}Kinda creeps me out.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I'm not into the buff, macho look.{LF}Kinda creeps me out.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Don't wanna see it on me, don't wanna{LF}see it on my partner...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Don't wanna see it on me, don't wanna{LF}see it on my partner...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Less bitching, more climbing.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Less bitching, more climbing.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ugh, how much further is it? This trail sucks...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ugh, how much further is it? This trail sucks...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm sure it beats spending another night with Five.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm sure it beats spending another night with Five.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You have no idea.{#Name="Dito"}
source: You have no idea.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: That nympho freak was always making me{LF}try some new kink she'd heard about.{#Name="Dito"}
source: That nympho freak was always making me{LF}try some new kink she'd heard about.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: What's a kink?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: What's a kink?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You don't need to know.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You don't need to know.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: She's here! It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: She's here! It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: She's got some guy with her!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: She's got some guy with her!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: She's taking hostages now? Dammit!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: She's taking hostages now? Dammit!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Wait. That's no hostage. It's a disciple!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Wait. That's no hostage. It's a disciple!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: An Intoner, a disciple, AND a dragon!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: An Intoner, a disciple, AND a dragon!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: That's it, we're screwed.{LF}We are so screwed right now.{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: That's it, we're screwed.{LF}We are so screwed right now.{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: We've got the terrain advantage!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: We've got the terrain advantage!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: 地の利しかこちらにはない、とも言うがな！{#Name="兵士E"}
source: 地の利しかこちらにはない、とも言うがな！{#Name="兵士E"}

translation: We can't let her past us!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: We can't let her past us!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: I'll lay down my life if necessary!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: I'll lay down my life if necessary!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I'm thinking that's probably gonna be necessary...{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: I'm thinking that's probably gonna be necessary...{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: She's so strong! How could we ever...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: She's so strong! How could we ever...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: All men, sound off!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: All men, sound off!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Y-Yes, sir! ...Yaaaahhhh!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Y-Yes, sir! ...Yaaaahhhh!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: I had no idea such an Intoner existed...{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: I had no idea such an Intoner existed...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: A far cry from Lady Four.{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: A far cry from Lady Four.{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: There is no greater glory than{LF}to die for your Intoner.{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: There is no greater glory than{LF}to die for your Intoner.{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Well, it's even better to LIVE{LF}for your Intoner!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Well, it's even better to LIVE{LF}for your Intoner!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: So belay that talk and keep fighting!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: So belay that talk and keep fighting!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: 戦で野垂れ死んで、何がキマる？戦え！{#Name="兵士B"}
source: 戦で野垂れ死んで、何がキマる？戦え！{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: We can't win... We need to flee.{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: We can't win... We need to flee.{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: It doesn't matter how hard we fight...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: It doesn't matter how hard we fight...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Lady Four can't protect us here!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Lady Four can't protect us here!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Chase her down! Our numbers can overwhelm her!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Chase her down! Our numbers can overwhelm her!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I don't think numbers matter to an Intoner.{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: I don't think numbers matter to an Intoner.{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Get behind her!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Get behind her!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We can do this! ...Most likely! ...I think!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: We can do this! ...Most likely! ...I think!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Huh? What's with the flower in her eye?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Huh? What's with the flower in her eye?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Man, just think how strong she was{LF}BEFORE she had her arm replaced...{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Man, just think how strong she was{LF}BEFORE she had her arm replaced...{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: We must give Lady Four time to escape!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: We must give Lady Four time to escape!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: May Lady Four be forever blessed!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: May Lady Four be forever blessed!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Protect her! Protect her! Protect—{LF}Wait, no, protect MEEE!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Protect her! Protect her! Protect—{LF}Wait, no, protect MEEE!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Everything okay, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Everything okay, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Surprisingly, yeah.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Surprisingly, yeah.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: These guys were a cinch once{LF}I softened them up, right?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: These guys were a cinch once{LF}I softened them up, right?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Uh...sure.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Uh...sure.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You can thank me after the battle's over, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You can thank me after the battle's over, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Assuming you're even alive.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Assuming you're even alive.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ugh, look at those bulging muscles! Gross!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ugh, look at those bulging muscles! Gross!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: If any of these meatheads put the moves{LF}on me, I'd stab 'em in the face.{#Name="Dito"}
source: If any of these meatheads put the moves{LF}on me, I'd stab 'em in the face.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You need help, Dito?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You need help, Dito?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No offense, but if I'm gonna get help,{LF}I'm gonna get it from Zero.{#Name="Dito"}
source: No offense, but if I'm gonna get help,{LF}I'm gonna get it from Zero.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Aw, ask for me! Ask for me, too!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Aw, ask for me! Ask for me, too!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Nngh, what a pain in the ass!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nngh, what a pain in the ass!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeah, well, not exactly the roomiest{LF}place for all these guys.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, well, not exactly the roomiest{LF}place for all these guys.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Less talk, more murder.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Less talk, more murder.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 地形を変えるつもり？{#Name="ディト"}
source: 地形を変えるつもり？{#Name="ディト"}

translation: いや、兵士を殺すんだ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: いや、兵士を殺すんだ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Wow, Dito. You're pretty good at killing.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Wow, Dito. You're pretty good at killing.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yeah, well, I'm a rookie compared{LF}to your boss there.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, well, I'm a rookie compared{LF}to your boss there.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Well, either way, killing is hard, right?{LF}And not very fun.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, either way, killing is hard, right?{LF}And not very fun.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Oh yeah. It's hard. Real hard.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh yeah. It's hard. Real hard.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I cry big salty tears about it every single night.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I cry big salty tears about it every single night.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: ...Is that what you wanted to hear?{LF}Ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}
source: ...Is that what you wanted to hear?{LF}Ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: There're barricades everywhere.{#Name="Dito"}
source: There're barricades everywhere.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Break 'em down!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Break 'em down!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's crazy how much effort Four{LF}spent securing this place.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's crazy how much effort Four{LF}spent securing this place.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's an Intoner for you.{LF}Excessing to the point of obsession.{#Name="Dito"}
source: That's an Intoner for you.{LF}Excessing to the point of obsession.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: ...Well, present company excepted and all that.{#Name="Dito"}
source: ...Well, present company excepted and all that.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I could obsess over killing you, you know.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I could obsess over killing you, you know.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Me? Uh, that was the enemy speaking!{LF}Go get 'em, tiger!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Me? Uh, that was the enemy speaking!{LF}Go get 'em, tiger!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: 呼んだ？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: 呼んだ？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 遅い！呼んだらスグ来い{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 遅い！呼んだらスグ来い{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: そうそう。それがパシリの鉄則だよ{#Name="ディト"}
source: そうそう。それがパシリの鉄則だよ{#Name="ディト"}

translation: パシリって何？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: パシリって何？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: すばらしき仲間のことだ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: すばらしき仲間のことだ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: そっか！がんばるよ、ボク！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: そっか！がんばるよ、ボク！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: なんか悪い予感がする{#Name="ディト"}
source: なんか悪い予感がする{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ゼロといっしょにいるからだよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロといっしょにいるからだよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: ボクもいい予感がしたことなんて１度もない！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ボクもいい予感がしたことなんて１度もない！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 言い切ったね{#Name="ディト"}
source: 言い切ったね{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Watch out. There's more of 'em.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Watch out. There's more of 'em.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't know when to quit, huh?{LF}Reminds me of a certain someone...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Don't know when to quit, huh?{LF}Reminds me of a certain someone...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: 無防備にここまで来たのが運の尽きだな{#Name="兵士A"}
source: 無防備にここまで来たのが運の尽きだな{#Name="兵士A"}

translation: こっちには隠し球があるぞっ！{#Name="兵士B"}
source: こっちには隠し球があるぞっ！{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: ケルベロスを出せっ！{#Name="兵士E"}
source: ケルベロスを出せっ！{#Name="兵士E"}

translation: いけいけ！やっちまえ、ケルベロス{#Name="兵士D"}
source: いけいけ！やっちまえ、ケルベロス{#Name="兵士D"}

translation: ウタヒメなんてボロ雑巾にしてしまえ！{#Name="兵士G"}
source: ウタヒメなんてボロ雑巾にしてしまえ！{#Name="兵士G"}

translation: ケルベロスは両刃の剣となりえよう{#Name="兵士F"}
source: ケルベロスは両刃の剣となりえよう{#Name="兵士F"}

translation: まあ、アイツにとっちゃ俺達もエサだからな{#Name="兵士E"}
source: まあ、アイツにとっちゃ俺達もエサだからな{#Name="兵士E"}

translation: 恐ろしいことだ。恐ろしいことだ{#Name="兵士F"}
source: 恐ろしいことだ。恐ろしいことだ{#Name="兵士F"}

translation: もはやケルベロスに命運を託すしか……{#Name="兵士A"}
source: もはやケルベロスに命運を託すしか……{#Name="兵士A"}

translation: やめてくださいよ。そういう捨て鉢な作戦は失敗しますって！{#Name="兵士G"}
source: やめてくださいよ。そういう捨て鉢な作戦は失敗しますって！{#Name="兵士G"}

translation: じゃあ、オマエがゼロを殺せるか？{#Name="兵士A"}
source: じゃあ、オマエがゼロを殺せるか？{#Name="兵士A"}

translation: 無理無理。無理ですけど{#Name="兵士G"}
source: 無理無理。無理ですけど{#Name="兵士G"}

translation: ゼロが苦戦してるぞ。ざまあみろ！{#Name="兵士C"}
source: ゼロが苦戦してるぞ。ざまあみろ！{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: あ、ケルベロスがこっち見た{#Name="兵士D"}
source: あ、ケルベロスがこっち見た{#Name="兵士D"}

translation: やべえ。隠れろ！{#Name="兵士C"}
source: やべえ。隠れろ！{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: 食い殺せ、ケルベロス！{#Name="兵士B"}
source: 食い殺せ、ケルベロス！{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: わっ、呼びかけるなよ。こっち向くぞ{#Name="兵士C"}
source: わっ、呼びかけるなよ。こっち向くぞ{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: エサは俺達じゃないぞ。そっち！ウタヒメの方！{#Name="兵士D"}
source: エサは俺達じゃないぞ。そっち！ウタヒメの方！{#Name="兵士D"}

translation: ケルベロスがいれば大丈夫だろう……{#Name="兵士A"}
source: ケルベロスがいれば大丈夫だろう……{#Name="兵士A"}

translation: 本当ですか？{#Name="兵士G"}
source: 本当ですか？{#Name="兵士G"}

translation: ヤツの腹がゼロ１人を食べて満たされればな{#Name="兵士A"}
source: ヤツの腹がゼロ１人を食べて満たされればな{#Name="兵士A"}

translation: まだ腹減ってたら……ひぃぃぃぃ！{#Name="兵士G"}
source: まだ腹減ってたら……ひぃぃぃぃ！{#Name="兵士G"}

translation: どんなもんだ！死にに来い、ゼロ！{#Name="兵士B"}
source: どんなもんだ！死にに来い、ゼロ！{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: あぶないぞ。あやつの目は死など恐れておらぬ{#Name="兵士F"}
source: あぶないぞ。あやつの目は死など恐れておらぬ{#Name="兵士F"}

translation: あやつ……なんて目をしているのだ……{#Name="兵士F"}
source: あやつ……なんて目をしているのだ……{#Name="兵士F"}

translation: じじい、ボケっとすんな！死にてぇのか！{#Name="兵士B"}
source: じじい、ボケっとすんな！死にてぇのか！{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: ケルベロスでも止められなかったらどうすんだ？{#Name="兵士C"}
source: ケルベロスでも止められなかったらどうすんだ？{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: そんな事考えるなっ{#Name="兵士D"}
source: そんな事考えるなっ{#Name="兵士D"}

translation: Well, here's a piece of bad news.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, here's a piece of bad news.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: A cerberus, huh? What's the plan, boss?{#Name="Dito"}
source: A cerberus, huh? What's the plan, boss?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: The plan? I was thinking we'd kill it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: The plan? I was thinking we'd kill it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Shocker.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Shocker.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Zero, this looks like a tough one!{LF}A real tough one!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero, this looks like a tough one!{LF}A real tough one!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I know! Stop repeating everything!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I know! Stop repeating everything!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Maybe I could breathe some fire from up here?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Maybe I could breathe some fire from up here?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: As long as you don't hit me with it!{#Name="Zero"}
source: As long as you don't hit me with it!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeesh. That's a face only a mother could love.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeesh. That's a face only a mother could love.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I mean, seriously, with a mug like that,{LF}it's no wonder he became a monster.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I mean, seriously, with a mug like that,{LF}it's no wonder he became a monster.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I almost feel bad for the guy.{LF}...Meh, oh well!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I almost feel bad for the guy.{LF}...Meh, oh well!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You think some stupid mutt's gonna stop me?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You think some stupid mutt's gonna stop me?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Be careful, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Be careful, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I'll try double hard, too, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'll try double hard, too, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I don't like killing, but I hate the{LF}idea of you dying even more!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I don't like killing, but I hate the{LF}idea of you dying even more!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: ボクの助けがいる時は呼んでね{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ボクの助けがいる時は呼んでね{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: わかった。とりあえず、そこからうっかり落ちるなよ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: わかった。とりあえず、そこからうっかり落ちるなよ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: さ、さっき落ちそうになったよ……{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: さ、さっき落ちそうになったよ……{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: アイツ！あとで説教だ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: アイツ！あとで説教だ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: お疲れ様でーす{#Name="ディト"}
source: お疲れ様でーす{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Boy, that was one tough pup, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Boy, that was one tough pup, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I was nervous the whole time!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I was nervous the whole time!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Why? It's not like I was going to lose.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Why? It's not like I was going to lose.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...And don't call it a pup.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...And don't call it a pup.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: オトメの告白か！{#Name="ディト"}
source: オトメの告白か！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: He's not a whole lot of help, is he?{#Name="ディト"}
source: He's not a whole lot of help, is he?{#Name="ディト"}

translation: What? Wait, who?{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: What? Wait, who?{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Not really.{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: Not really.{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: He just kind of stomps around and wrecks shit randomly.{#Name="ディト"}
source: He just kind of stomps around and wrecks shit randomly.{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Guys! Hey, guys?{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: Guys! Hey, guys?{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Why don't you ditch him already?{#Name="ディト"}
source: Why don't you ditch him already?{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Guys, who are we talking about?{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: Guys, who are we talking about?{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Yeah, but he makes a good meat shield. ...Plus he can fly.{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: Yeah, but he makes a good meat shield. ...Plus he can fly.{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Hey, Zero! I can fly! I can fly too!{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: Hey, Zero! I can fly! I can fly too!{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: ...You're right. Let's ditch him.{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ...You're right. Let's ditch him.{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: So...once things calm down, maybe{LF}you and me could have some fun...{#Name="Dito"}
source: So...once things calm down, maybe{LF}you and me could have some fun...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I mean, you are a lot more attractive{LF}than ol' Blubber Bags, after all.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I mean, you are a lot more attractive{LF}than ol' Blubber Bags, after all.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: If I feel like it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: If I feel like it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: へへっ。ゼロさんってばケモノだなあ{#Name="ディト"}
source: へへっ。ゼロさんってばケモノだなあ{#Name="ディト"}

translation: So what's Four like, anyway?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So what's Four like, anyway?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: She's a virgin.{#Name="Zero"}
source: She's a virgin.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uh, is that it, or...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Uh, is that it, or...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: She's a virgin Intoner. Think about it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: She's a virgin Intoner. Think about it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hmm. Yeah, well, girl must have{LF}a real stick up her ass.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hmm. Yeah, well, girl must have{LF}a real stick up her ass.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: And what kind of idiot disciple{LF}would serve a virgin Intoner?{#Name="Dito"}
source: And what kind of idiot disciple{LF}would serve a virgin Intoner?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Got me. Probably some depraved pervert.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Got me. Probably some depraved pervert.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can imagine.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I can imagine.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hey, dragon. You and Zero ever sleep together?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, dragon. You and Zero ever sleep together?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nah. She says I stink.{LF}Plus, I might roll over and smoosh her.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Nah. She says I stink.{LF}Plus, I might roll over and smoosh her.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Ha ha ha! Man, that's rich.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha ha! Man, that's rich.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Well, tell you what—you just stay away from{LF}us tonight, all right? I'll take care of Z.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Well, tell you what—you just stay away from{LF}us tonight, all right? I'll take care of Z.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Okay! Try not to crush her.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Okay! Try not to crush her.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Ah ha ha! If anyone's gonna get crushed,{LF}I hope it's me!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ah ha ha! If anyone's gonna get crushed,{LF}I hope it's me!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Whoa! He's back!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Whoa! He's back!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: This fucker won't give up!{#Name="Zero"}
source: This fucker won't give up!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The hell is up with this mutt!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: The hell is up with this mutt!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Some dogs just don't know when to give up.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Some dogs just don't know when to give up.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Get him, Zero! Get that sourbreath!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Get him, Zero! Get that sourbreath!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: It's cerberus, idiot!{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's cerberus, idiot!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeah, idiot. Pay attention.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, idiot. Pay attention.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Get that saber... Er, get that slobber... Hold on!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Get that saber... Er, get that slobber... Hold on!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: 連携しっかり！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 連携しっかり！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: はいっ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: はいっ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 無理っしょ。これだけ気持ちがバラバラなのに{#Name="ディト"}
source: 無理っしょ。これだけ気持ちがバラバラなのに{#Name="ディト"}

translation: 後で殴られたくなかったら、連携しっかり！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 後で殴られたくなかったら、連携しっかり！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: はいっ！{#Name="ディト・ミハイル"}
source: はいっ！{#Name="ディト・ミハイル"}

translation: Ugh, look at that nasty thing,{LF}fighting to stay alive...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ugh, look at that nasty thing,{LF}fighting to stay alive...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nothing worse than some stupid chump{LF}who doesn't know how ugly he is!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Nothing worse than some stupid chump{LF}who doesn't know how ugly he is!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ha ha! I'll put you back where you belong!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha! I'll put you back where you belong!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hmph.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmph.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero! Are you okay!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! Are you okay!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Holy shit...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Holy shit...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: So...that's how an Intoner regenerates...?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So...that's how an Intoner regenerates...?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: This can't end...until all of them are dead.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This can't end...until all of them are dead.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It can't end.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It can't end.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: 敵残り 6 体！{#Name="説明文"}
source: 敵残り 6 体！{#Name="説明文"}

translation: It's Zero! Zero's come to kill us!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: It's Zero! Zero's come to kill us!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Stop panicking and get into defensive position!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Stop panicking and get into defensive position!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: After defeating Five in the Land of Seas,{#Name="Accord"}
source: After defeating Five in the Land of Seas,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Zero took Dito, her sister's disciple, and made for her next destination.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Zero took Dito, her sister's disciple, and made for her next destination.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The Land of Mountains...{#Name="Accord"}
source: The Land of Mountains...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Home to an impenetrable alpine citadel{#Name="Accord"}
source: Home to an impenetrable alpine citadel{#Name="Accord"}

translation: governed by the chaste Intoner known as Four.{#Name="Accord"}
source: governed by the chaste Intoner known as Four.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: All troops, defensive positions!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: All troops, defensive positions!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Your invasion ends here, demon!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Your invasion ends here, demon!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Well, someone's confident.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, someone's confident.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Dammit! She's too strong!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Dammit! She's too strong!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Hold your ground! Defend Lady Four at all costs!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Hold your ground! Defend Lady Four at all costs!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Urrrgh...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Urrrgh...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Hang on, Zero! I'll help! I'll totally help you!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hang on, Zero! I'll help! I'll totally help you!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Kinda freaky how wimpy these guys are.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Kinda freaky how wimpy these guys are.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: That's because Zero's with us!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: That's because Zero's with us!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: She makes EVERYTHING freaky!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: She makes EVERYTHING freaky!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: May the light shine upon our flawless icon, Lady Four!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: May the light shine upon our flawless icon, Lady Four!{#Name="Soldier C"}
